original_text:
“Consider now: Who, being innocent, has ever perished?
    Where were the upright ever destroyed?
korean_text: 생각하여 보라 죄 없이 망한 자가 누구인가 정직한 자의 끊어짐이 어디 있는가

sentences.original_text: Who, being innocent, has ever perished?
sentences.korean_translation: 무엇이, 죄 없이, 멸망한 적이 있는가?

sentences.original_text: Where were the upright ever destroyed?
sentences.korean_translation: 어디에서 정직한 자들이 파괴된 적이 있는가?
